job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Typetone's AI technology already yields significant efficiency returns for our customers. However, large language models are a new type of intelligence, and the art of instructing them in a way that delivers the best results is still in its infancy - it's a hybrid between programming, instructing, and teaching. You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks, but even more important: custom train models to our customer's needs.

   Given that the field of prompt-engineering is arguably less than 2 years old, this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world! If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them. If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.

   Representative Projects
     * Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
     * Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
     * Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.
job_details.full_text:
Prompt/Modelling Engineer Intern

Typetone's AI technology already yields significant efficiency returns for our customers. However, large language models are a new type of intelligence, and the art of instructing them in a way that delivers the best results is still in its infancy - it's a hybrid between programming, instructing, and teaching. You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks, but even more important: custom train models to our customer's needs.

   Given that the field of prompt-engineering is arguably less than 2 years old, this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world! If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them. If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.

   Representative Projects
     * Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
     * Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
     * Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes prompt engineering, custom training of LLMs, and building applications around generative models. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on language and interaction specialists.

phrases: custom train models to our customer's needs
modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly refer to the process of training or fine-tuning machine learning models, specifically large language models (LLMs), which is a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task category, particularly for generative AI.

phrases: Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: Building tutorials and interactive tools involves software development to create user-facing educational content and applications, fitting the 'Software Development' category.

phrases: figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks
Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand customer needs and translate them into effective AI prompting strategies and best practices, aligning with 'Business Understanding'.

mentions: this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world!
figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks
get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts
Discover, test, and document best practices
Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools
